article_title: Piping plovers having worst year since receiving federal 'threatened' status
article_text:
PLOVERS DECIMATED Plover populations at Malibu Beach in Egg Harbor Township are near a record-low this year due to predation, recreation activities and habitat loss. State biologists are racing to figure out why this year has been particularly bad

PLOVERS DECIMATED Eric Schrading, left Field Supervisor U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service and Todd Pover, foreground right Beach Nesting Bird Project Manager talk about the Plover populations at Malibu Beach in Egg Harbor Township are near a record-low this year due to predation, recreation activities and habitat loss. State biologists are racing to figure out why this year has been particularly bad

og.description: EGG HARBOR TOWNSHIP — Eric Schrading can spot the quick-legged piping plover from a hundred yards down Malibu Beach.
